page.title: 11RELIGION THE GRAVEYARD
page.content: A study of a graveyard can reveal some very interesting facts.In Northop there is quite a large graveyard and one of the activities we carried out was an examination of it.The oldest was dated 1832 and the most recent was 1985, with over 400 graves in total. There were also 3 family plots which housed multiple burials.The youngest person named on a gravestone was a certain Mary-Anne Jones who died on May 27th 1873,. aged 10 months. We noticed that there were many graves of servicemen who had died during The Great War of 1914-1918 and there was also a grave of a Belgian refugee. One sign of our times is that like the church, the graveyard was always under close scrutiny as damage had been caused quite recently.It was sad to see that some gravestones were in bad repair.Much work is needed.
